name: Lethal Turtle, Gonna Destroy!
description:
Created by Thatonedude077 & Lil Monch

Controls: 

f1 to Fullscreen and esc to exit

Arrow keys or Controller D-pad to Move

Shoot- Z on keyboard & A on controller 

Shell Shield-X on keyboard & B on Controller

Shell Spin- C on keyboard & X on Controller

Shell Spin deflects all enemy projectile and Shell Shield protects you at the cost of not being able to move.

Press Spacebar or Start to begin

For shell deflect sound effect I used:                                                                                   https://freesound.org/people/Taira%20Komori/sounds/214048/
